comment._content:
bmarlowe1 - I see that you have provided names.  Olaf Henriksen is my family member-  do you also have a name of the boy standing in front of him, and the little girl standing in the back row.

comment.author: 40631657@N00
comment._content: In a newspaper (NY Daily Times) version of a picture of the same group from a different angle, the girl is listed as "Miss Wood," meaning it should be Virginia Wood, Smoky Joe's daughter. The boy is the mascot who is listed as McCarthy, and therefore should be Jerry McCarthy.
